website_summaries.verdict: Offers an attractive design and stability while lighting.
pros: Compact design is a great fit for those chefs who love to travel
Top-lighting is easier to use than other handheld models
A handy way to add flavor to sous vide meats and fish
cons: The hose is on the flimsy side and kinks easily
Some buyers found this option difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, great price and i actually use it to infuse smoke into my cocktails. I either infuse it directly into the shaker cup before shaking or sometimes i fill a glass container with smoke and put the drink inside.
customer_reviews.author: Pat rocca

customer_reviews.title: One of the biggest hits given as a small side gift to a newbie bbq smoke master!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it and it creates an incredible amount of smoke, no matter what is put in it. Imparts a smokey flavor in a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Gal

customer_reviews.title: Works well - not much to it but it does what its supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to give as gifts, mostly for smoking fish and making smoked cocktails. Works well, realizing that its not much more than a little fan that blows smoke down a hose. You do need to be careful not to get the wood too hot in the chamber, as the fan could melt and/or stick. Instructions are good, seems built well enough and its fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: govy1

customer_reviews.title: Like It But.......
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Works well. 2) Very sturdy 3) Not loud 4) Easy to install, and remove batteries; and operate Cons: 1) The hose came with two kinks that were not able to straightened 2) Hose is very flimsy and the ends weren't cut evenly 3) The wood chamber is quite small; but don't need a lot of wood chips/pellets. Luckily I have an extra rubber hose; so will use that instead.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Love the function but broke within 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I love having a smoker but with this one the oils from the wood go into the housing and they clogged it and stopped the fan from rotating. Plus when you try to clean it its just impossible unless you take it all apart. I have ordered from a different manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: ConcordNC

customer_reviews.title: Best price for one of these on Amazon. Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine in today and got to try it out. It works great and puts out plenty of smoke. The housing feels very robust and looks like it will last a long time if properly taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weathermon

customer_reviews.title: Stops Working After 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Well at first I was happy. It puts out a lot of smoke. But after only 2 weeks of low usage, stops working. Not to happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The directions say not to keep running beyond 30 seconds. Well, if you don't then it won't make smoke. I had to continue to run it to keep getting smoke. Does it smoke? Yes. Not as much as I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: #LOVEMYLITTLESMOKER

customer_reviews.title: great smoker!

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing

product_meta.title: Eurolox Infusion Smoker
product_meta.description:
Add a depth of flavor to all your dishes. Smoking out your food is going to become your new hobby!

Once you’ve cooked some food or served some mixed cocktail drinks you may want to add a little kick to those flavors.
The only way to do this quickly and easily at home is with this handheld smoking gun.

Traditional smokers are expensive and take up a lot of space.
Our mini smoke infuser can give you the same effect at a fraction of the cost and time.
You can even get really creative by adding tea, herbs, spices, hay, dried flowers to the smoker gun chamber.

General Features:
✔ No Special Equipment Required – To add some smoke to your food you just need to light some wood chips inside the burner chamber and that’s it.
No need for a giant smoking machine with all kinds of equipment, this mini machine does it all.

✔ Great for Adding Flavor to Vegetarian Foods – If you are a vegan or vegetarian that misses the flavor of meat, you can use this machine.
Smoking your food gives vegetarian dishes a meaty smoky flavor without the meat.

✔ Portable and Compact - Easy to carry for your BBQ, picnic, hiking, fishing needs. Compact storage size saves space.
Stick this little smoker inside your picnic bag or backpack.

✔ Turn Your Kitchen Into a 5 Star Restaurant - Adding a deep Smokey flavor to your homemade dishes takes a dinner party to a whole new level.
Just be sure to hide your smoking gun before the guest come in, so they can’t figure out your secret.

Specifications:
➤ Size: 6.8 x 6.8 x 15.8 cm
➤ Battery: 4xAA batteries required (NOT included)
➤ Material: Aluminum
➤ Note: Do not put the entire unit into water or other liquid

Box Contains:
➤ 1 X Handheld Smoking Gun
➤ 1 X User Manual

Try your hand today at smoking steak, seafood, cocktails or crudités.
The possibilities are simply endless. Get it NOW to experience the difference!
feature_bullets: ♨️ SMOKE EM OUT – ADD THAT SOPHISTICATED SMOKY FLAVOR TO ANY FOOD OR DRINKS - Simply hold the smoke gun pipe into the desired food or drink and you will have a delicious tasting flavor. You can do this with alcoholic beverages such as Whisky and cocktails. Or food like sous vide meat, vegetables, cheese, cocktails, salmon.

♨️ SURPRISE YOUR GUESTS WITH A HEALTHY 5 STAR MEAL – Instead of buying ready smoked foods or wondering how 5-star restaurants make those smoky flavored hors d’oeuvres, you can use our smoke infuser today. smoke infusing is much healthier than using “liquid smoke” that contains many chemicals. This will not heat up your food as it infuses the cold smoke.

♨️ HANDHELD SMOKE GUN FOR FAST EFFICIENT SMOKING – Instead of having to smoke meals on the grill or outdoors, you can do it easily right in your kitchen. The smoker machine makes quick work of smoking with wood chips, tea, herbs, spices, hay, dried flowers. Each portion of food or drink will only take 3~5 minutes to add that succulent cold smoke flavor and aroma.

♨️ COMPACT DESIGN FOR CONVENIENTLY TRAVELLING AND OUTDOORS PARTIES – Whether you are going on a fishing trip, hiking picnic, or throwing a BBQ you are going to be remembered with this handheld smoker. The portable smoke gun is smaller than a regular smoker grill and makes smoking outdoors easy. No need to plug into an electrical outlet

♨️ EASY TO USE, EASY TO CLEAN – Take your small food and drink smoker and insert 4xAA Batteries to operate (batteries are NOT included) The handheld smoke infusion can be used with wood chips and other materials. Light the wood chips inside the burner chamber and you can then smoke away to hearts delight. do not use in dishwasher.
